name: Commerce Layer Metrics
long_description: The Metrics Local MCP Server exposes a set of tools to interact with Commerce Layer [Metrics API](https://docs.commercelayer.io/metrics) and enables you to extract almost any kind of data information from your organization order, return, or cart history.

tools.name: orders-breakdown
tools.description: Run the breakdown function on orders

tools.name: orders-date-breakdown
tools.description: Run the date-breakdown function on orders

tools.name: orders-search
tools.description: Run the search function on orders

tools.name: orders-stats
tools.description: Run the stats function on orders

tools.name: carts-breakdown
tools.description: Run the breakdown function on carts

tools.name: carts-date-breakdown
tools.description: Run the date-breakdown function on carts

tools.name: carts-search
tools.description: Run the search function on carts

tools.name: carts-stats
tools.description: Run the stats function on carts

tools.description: Run the breakdown function on returns

tools.name: returns-date-breakdown
tools.description: Run the date-breakdown function on returns

tools.name: returns-search
tools.description: Run the search function on returns

tools.name: returns-stats
tools.description: Run the stats function on returns

tools.name: fbt
tools.description: Frequently Bought Together, FBTs are a type of analysis query that allows to retrieve the items that most frequently have been added as line items in the same orders as a specified item (SKU or bundle) or array of items

tools.name: best-selling-products-by-market
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the Top N best-selling products for each of your organization's market

tools.name: customers_that_bought_a_specific_product
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of customers that bought a specific product or bundle

tools.name: frequently-bought-together-products
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the products that have been most frequently bought together with other ones

tools.name: last-carts-with-a-specific-product-from-a-specific-market
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the most recently created carts containing a specific SKU, from a specific market

tools.name: latest-archived-orders
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the most recently archived orders

tools.name: latest-placed-orders-from-customers-with-specific-email-domains
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the last placed orders containing specific email domains in the aggregated details

tools.name: number-of-products-per-order-by-country
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get mixed stats about the number of SKUs included in the orders of your organization, grouped by different countries

tools.name: orders-associated-with-a-specific-promotion
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders that triggered a specific promotion

tools.name: orders-by-bundle
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders containing a bundle, grouped by the bundle name

tools.name: orders-by-currency
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders of your organization, grouped by different currencies

tools.name: orders-by-day
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders of your organization, grouped by day

tools.name: orders-by-repeat-customer
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders of your organization, grouped by customers that bought from you more than once

tools.name: orders-by-resource-error-code-and-message
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to check the errors associated with the orders of your organization (if any)

tools.name: orders-by-shipment-status-and-shipping-method-name
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders of your organization, grouped by the associated shipment status and the related shipping method name

tools.name: orders-by-status-and-payment-status
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders of your organization, grouped by their status and the related payment status

tools.name: orders-paid-with-gift-cards
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of orders that were paid using a gift card

tools.name: refunds-by-country-and-currency
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of refunds of your organization, grouped by the different countries and currencies

tools.name: returns-per-year-by-destination-city
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the total number of returns requested for your orders, grouped by year and destination city

tools.name: shipments-average-time-in-picking
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the average time your shipments stay in picking status before being packed

tools.name: top-10-spenders-by-currency
tools.description: How to use the Metrics API to get the top spenders among your customers and know how their total purchase amount is divided by currency
